intro: The v-icon component provides a large set of glyphs to provide context to various aspects of your application. For a list of all available icons, visit the official Material Design Icons page. To use any of these icons simply use the mdi- prefix followed by the icon name.

color.heading: Color
color.intro: Using color helpers you can change the color of an icon from the standard dark and light themes.

click.heading: Click
click.intro: Binding any click event to v-icon will automatically change the cursor to a pointer.

buttons.heading: Buttons
buttons.intro: Icons can be used inside of buttons to add emphasis to the action.
